causes: poor list hygiene or purchased lists
shared hosting or IP reputation issues
immediate_actions: identify which blacklist or filter is blocking the domain
verify SPF, DKIM, and DMARC alignment
remove recent spam sources and clean lists
submit delisting requests with evidence of remediation
mistakes: switching domains without fixing root cause
using aggressive subject lines and links
sending to inactive or unverified contacts
prevention: monitor reputation and blacklist status weekly
use confirmed opt-in and engagement-based pruning
